Cell.Data: Perform a basic attack with your equipped weapon.
You raise in the air and fall down on your enemies in a powerful blast that inflicts Sacred Damage and have a chance to Stun them.
Conjures explosions from the ground in a forward line, dealing Physical Damage to enemies in front of you.
Throws a powerful Fire projectile in front of you which explodes when hitting an enemy or obstacle.
Casts Lightning arcs from your hands which deal continuous Damage and have a chance to Shock.
Casts down projectiles in the area surrounding you which inflict Fire Damage to your enemies.
Violently slams the ground, inflicting Stun to nearby enemies.
Performs a powerful Melee combo with your Shield and equipped weapon.
Performs a long Melee combo with your equipped weapon.
Performs numerous attacks with your equipped weapons.
Performs slow and wide-ranged thrusts with your equipped Broadsword.
Performs very powerful but slow attacks with your Warhammer.
Performs wide-ranged attacks with your Battleaxe.
Performs a very quick assault with your Daggers.
Perform swift Ranged attacks with your equipped Pistol.
Perform numerous attacks with your Pistols.
Perform close-ranged attacks with your equipped weapons. Use Shift + attack in order to use your Pistol from a long distance.
Shoots multiple projectiles at the same time with your equipped weapon within a wide forward angle.
Swings your weapon in a powerful circular motion, striking enemies around you while moving and inflicting Damage depending on your equipped Weapons.
A violent Melee attack that deals Damage to nearby enemies depending on your equipped Weapons.
Plants a trap on the ground which explodes after a short delay, inflicting Umbral Damage to enemies caught in the blast.
A medium-ranged nova which Freezes nearby enemies.
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Fire spells at the enemy.
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Frost spells at the enemy.
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Lightning spells at the enemy.
Uses the power of a mage staff to unleash Umbra spells at the enemy.
Casts down several arrows which hit all enemies in a remote area, inflicting Damage depending on your equipped Weapons. The falling arrows are affected by Ammunition skills.
Launches a Knife forward which inflicts Rend Damage to a single enemy and has increased Critical Chance. Uses charges which are generated with time.
Instantly expulses all enemies in front of you and knocks them down.
A wide Slash that deals Rend Damage and inflicts Bleeding to all nearby enemies depending on the Damage dealt by your equipped Weapons.
You continuously cast flames from your hand, dealing Fire Damage to enemies in front of you.
Launches a Lightning orb forward that moves through enemies and hits them on the way. The duration of the orb is reduced for each enemy hit.

You perform a Shield bash which hits and Stuns a single enemy while Blocking incoming attacks. Consumes charges in order to be used. Charges are gained when Blocking attacks, and the amount of charges used to cast the spell determines its Damage. Ironguard also passively increases your Block Chance when equipped.
In passive mode, increases your Umbra regeneration and your Resistance against Spells. When you use the spell, you enter active mode and gain a temporary Spell Damage boost instead.

Allows you to switch between an offensive and a defensive stance. The offensive stance greatly increases your Attack speed and Spellcasting speed but lowers your Defense, while the defensive stance improves your Defensive Ability but reduces your Movement Speed.

Leaves a trap at your feet which deploys when enemies approach, snaring them and inflict Physical Damage to them. Uses charges which are generated with time. You can only have a limited number of traps in the world at the same time, and placing a new trap on the ground beyond the maximum number will remove the oldest one.

In passive mode, increases your Movement speed but decreases your Defense. When you use the spell, you enter active mode and become invisible for a short time instead (your Presence level becomes 0). When invisible, enemies don't target you unless you attack them.

Cycle through different Ammunition and give your shots special effects. Uses charges which are generated with time. Use the spell to cycle through Fire, Frost and Lightning shots. 
* Fire shots burn enemies. 
* Frost shots freeze enemies. 
* Lightning shots shock enemies.

Cycle through different Ammunition and give your shots special effects. Uses charges which are generated with time. Use the spell to cycle through Toxic, Serrated and Sharp shots. 
* Toxic shots infict Poison to enemies. 
* Serrated shots inflict Bleeding to enemies. 
* Sharp shots have increased Critical Damage and Chance.

Casts a Toxic aura which depletes your Umbra continuously while active and inflicts Poison stacks to nearby foes. The aura also increases your Toxic Damage and Toxic Resistance, and will automatically wear off when you run out of Umbra.
Launches a living projectile forward which deals Shadow Damage on impact. It consumes Corpses on its way, increasing the power of its final explosion.

Marks a single target and inflicts several stacks of Frailty. You can mark the same target multiple times, in which case it resets its marking duration and stacks the effects up to your maximum Status Ailments stacks number. Requires a valid target to be cast.

Launches a metallic chain forward which will pull its target directly to you while inflicting Bleeding stacks. It will send you towards your target instead if it can't be moved (Boss, destroyable object, etc.).
Summons a powerful beam from your hands, inflicting heavy Umbral damage to foes in front of you while you maintain the spell.
Summons a Frozen Comet that will quickly crash on the ground, dealing damage in the surrounding area.
Summons a High speed Frost Shard projectile.
The explosion radius of Brutal Strike is increased.
Hitting enemies with Brutal Strike may knock them down.
You automatically perform an other Brutal Strike when killing an enemy with it.
All your main Resistances are increased while you keep hitting enemies with Whirlwind (excepted Stun Resistance).
Your move speed is increased while you keep hitting enemies with Whirlwind.
Arrows Rain has a wider area of effect.
Rapid Shot fires one additional projectile.
Spread Shot shoots two more projectiles, resulting in a wider spread.
Reduces the dispersion of the projectiles, increasing the precision of Spread Shot.
Lightning Strike deals Damage much faster.
Lightning Strike jumps one extra time to another enemy.
Killing an enemy with Lightning Strike may trigger a Lightning Explosion.
Hitting enemies with Tremor may knock them down.
Tremor has a wider range of effect.
Tremor now inflicts Physical Damage on top of its default effect.
Seismic Rift triggers a higher number of explosions, thus reaching further enemies.
Seismic Rift has a chance to Stun targets.
Successively increases Seismic Rift's Damage for each explosion.
Seismic Rift now triggers 3 shorter lines instead of one.
Seismic Rift's explosions propagate much faster on ground.
Fire Rain launches more projectiles, thus lasting longer.
Fire Rain will follow you when you are moving.
The delay between each projectile is reduced, thus reducing the duration of Fire Rain and its missing rate.
Fire Rain's projectiles fall to the ground much faster.
Decreases Fire Rain radius and launches additional projectiles.
Laceration has a wider range of effect.
Enemies hit by Laceration will Bleed for a longer time.
Increases the Blown-Away distance from Umbral Blast.
Enemies hit by Umbral Blast will stay longer on the ground.
Increases the Critical Chance Modifier of Bladeslinger.
You have an extra chance to inflict Bleeding when performing a Critical hit with Bladeslinger.
You throw an axe at your target instead of a knife. It uses all charges available instead of one, and has increased Damage for each charge spent that way.
You gain one extra charge to use with Bladeslinger.
You have a chance to refill one charge of Bladeslinger when performing a Critical hit with it.
Bladeslinger's Critical Chance Modifier is increased the more charges you have when launching it.
Bladeslinger's Critical Chance Modifier is higher on low-life enemies.
Bladeslinger has a Chance to jump to another close enemy when performing a Critical hit.
Killing an enemy with Bladeslinger instantly refills one charge on it.
Thunderbolt has a higher Damage rate, hitting enemies more often.
Thunderbolt generates electrical arcs on its way, hitting enemies more often and in a wider radius.
Thunderbolt has a shorter duration and will explode when disappearing.
You casts Conflagration with both hands, creating a wider cone and hitting more enemies.
Conflagration has higher chance to Burn.
Increases the explosion radius of Disruption.
Reduces the explosion delay of Disruption.
Holy Dive has a higher chance to Stun.
Increases the explosion radius of Holy Dive.
Gaze of Ot-Mah reaches targets at a higher range.
Gaze of Ot-Mah is not stopped by encountered targets but deals reduced Damage.
Gaze of Ot-Mah suffers from a slower turning rate but deals higher Damage.
Why spend all that Umbra when you can achieve the same result for lower costs?
Reaching insanely low temperatures, Frost Comet has better chances of Freezing your enemies.
Decreases the casting delay of Frost Comet.
Increase the Ice density inside Frost Comet, resulting in higher damages but a longer cast delay.
Deals more damage near Frost Comet impact point but less aound the rim.
Frost Comet leaves a frozen area at the impact point, slowing nearby enemies.
Frost Comet has higher critical chance against frozen enemies.
Frost Comet is so cold it creates a blizzard around the impact point, damaging nearby enemies.
The summoned Comet gets a lot bigger. Just because you can. However, it adds a cooldown to the skill.
Frost Nova freezes enemies for a longer time.
Enemies hit by Frost Nova are more likely to die from a Frost Overkill.
Upon casting Frost Nova, you gain temporary Resistance to Frost Damage and Freezing.
It now takes time for the air to freeze, but the radius of Frost Nova is increased.
If you Freeze enough enemies in one cast, you get healed for a percentage of your max health. Can only be triggered on a cooldown.
Frost Nova is now cast at the cursor's location within its maximal Range.
Frost Nova leaves a Frost area on the ground, slowing enemies within it.
Greatly reduces the spell's Cooldown to the cost of additional Umbra. Also slightly decreases the Freezing chance.
Ice Shards come out of the ground at the same time the spell triggers, dealing Frost Damage to nearby enemies. Decreases the Freezing chance.
Decreases the Resource cost of Frost Lance.
Increases the Damage dealt by Frost Lance.
Frost Lance takes less time to form before it starts moving.
It takes more time to form Frost Lance, but it is bigger and deals additional Damages.
Each additional Frost Lance hitting an enemy increases the chance to Freeze it.
Frost Lance now deals Damage with respect to its travel distance.
Damage bonus for each successively hit target: %1
Charge(s) gained when the skill is equipped: %1
Charge(s) gained when the skill is used: %1
Charge(s) gained when the skill hits: %1
Charge(s) gained when killing an enemy with the skill: %1
Charge(s) gained when the skill's cooldown ends: %1
Charge(s) gained when causing a Critical hit with the skill: %1
Charge(s) lost when the skill is equipped: %1
Charge(s) lost when the skill is used: %1
Charge(s) lost when the skill hits: %1
Charge(s) lost when killing an enemy with the skill: %1
Charge(s) lost when the skill's cooldown ends: %1
Charge(s) lost when causing a Critical hit with the skill: %1
Critical Chance bonus per charge gained: %2%
Critical Damage bonus per charge gained: %2%
Bleeding stack(s) inflicted for each charge gained: %2
Additional projectile for each gained charge: %2
Critical Chance bonus per charge lost: %2%
Critical Damage bonus per charge lost: %2%
Bleeding stack(s) inflicted for each charge lost: %2
Additional projectile for each lost charge: %2
Critical Chance bonus per charge spent: %2%
Critical Damage bonus per charge spent: %2%
Bleeding stack(s) inflicted for each charge spent: %2
Additional projectile for each charge spent: %1
Cooldown duration when spending the last charge: %2
Ammunitions affect only Ranged shots and spells that explicitely state so
This spell is affected by skills and effects that usually affect Ranged shots (ammunitions, bouncing, etc.)
This spell is affected by Ammunition skills
Enemy's health threshold for increased Critical Chance modifier: %1
You can move through enemies while cloaked
This spell affects you as well as enemies
Requires a valid target to be cast
Pull yourself towards enemies by maintaining the spell key
This spell will affect all your attacks with Ranged Weapons as soons as it is equipped in your skills bar without requiring any further action
Number of summoned creatures is increased by %1
Maximum number of simultaneous summons is increased by %1
Angle between projectiles is increased by %1
Angle between projectiles is reduced by %1
Bladeslinger has one extra charge and gains charges faster. You may gain one Bladeslinger charge when performing a dodgeroll but you lose all of them when you are hit.

Bladeslinger has one extra charge and has increased Critical Chance. You may gain one Bladeslinge charge each time the spell hits, and it will have increased Critical Damage for each available charge at launch.
